title: LUXURY UPPER KIRBY + HIGHRISE CONDO+4-8wks free w/13+mo
neighborhood: Highland Village/ Upper Kirby/ West U
posting_body: The neighborhood surrounding this beautiful property is brimming with activities from the leisurely to the lively.
At the River Oaks District and The Galleria, you will have your pick of exclusive designer brands from classic to trendy.
And if a moment of zen is on the menu, you can find respite in some of Houston’s top day spas located mere minutes from home !
Skyline Bar, 360 Lounge, and Pool Terrace
Quick access to nature based attractions
Restaurants, Shops, and Hotspots are moments away
Two Palette and Balcony or Terrace Options
Quartz Counter Tops and 8' Door Delights
Will Consider: Co-signers, 1st time renters, Misdemeanors
Contact me today, Immediate move in and approval
